    "name": "Number of ways to place 8 nonattacking kings on an n X n toroidal board.",
    "link": [

    "formula": [
        "a(n) = 1/40320*n^2 * (n^14 -252*n^12 +27874*n^10 -1759800*n^8 +68745649*n^6 -1669136028*n^4 +23447322156*n^2 -147931524720), n>=9.",
